content: This jar of <style=Highlight>Luca</style> is now full. Please take it and continue watering the Luca Arbor.

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I heard from Mors that the <style=Highlight>Insectarium</style> has opened. Congratulations!

content: The planet's vitality will nourish its ecosystem. I'm certain that <style=PlayerName>{homestar}</style> will see many delightful new changes to its environment.
